page.title: 08Ashton Canal at Droylsden
page.content:
We did a survey on Sunday afternoon on 9th June,1985 to find out how many people use the canal. We spent about five minutes at each of four bridges across the canal and at the Water Activity Centre, Fairfield. This is what we found: 1. Fairfield Top Lock Bridge No.16 2. Fairfield Road Bridge No.17 3. Ashton Hill Lane Bridge No.18 4. Manchester Rd.Audenshaw Brdge No.19 5. Water Activity Centre, Fairfield
people fishermen barges dogs ducks ______________________________________ 1. 33 3 1 4 2 2. 4 0 1 1 4 3. 5 3 0 0 3 4. 6 2 1 1 9 5. 15 0 16canoes 1 3 ______________________________________
